item.description:
"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm on the phone ...

- with your questions
- to get support and suggestions
- to share your LOA experiences

RSVP "YES" and the telephone # to join us on call will be emailed to you


Kathryn Deputat, BostonLOA member and Clarity Coach, will be co-facilitating the call.
She will share some of her WOW LOA manifestations such as meeting her beloved life partner & expanding her life and work to Ireland , where she will live for most of the next year. Come and find out how she did it!

and yes, ask Kathryn how she manifested the perfect woman "on a dime" to TLC her home while she's away ... another part of the LOA story!!

Kathryn welcomes any and all questions about her experience/process--especially if they'll move you closer to your heart's desires too.




About Kathryn Deputat:

Kathryn is a writer, coach, photographer and clarity consultant who has been reuniting people with their inspiration, passion, and authentic expressions?in their lives and/or in their writing for more than 15 years.

A distinguished alumna of Wellesley College and a member of Phi Beta Kappa, Kathryn is founding owner of Claritywork.com.

She draws on highly attuned listening and intuitive gifts, and her techniques, rooted
in the Goldberg writing method, combine her interest and training in psychology, Zen
Buddhism, metaphysics, Emotional-Kinesthetic Psychotherapy, and vocal and visual
improvisation.

Kathryn's poetry. photos and articles have appeared in various publications, and she publishes
regularly on www.LovesFreeway.com....Where love has its way
item.why: Open Forum - Bring your questions, receive suggestions, share your LOA experiences, learn from each other, get to know each other

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA Masterminding TELE- Meetup
